source_objects.title: Creativity
source_objects.description: From idea generation to creative confidence, the power of the subconcious to innovation and invention, come discover methods of creativity.

items.headline: Art Therapy : Therapeutic Art and The Healing Process of Therapeutic Art For Self Expression and Self Healing
objectives_summary: Explore facets of your personality you never knew existed
Use art as a means of self expression
Create art without judgement

items.headline: Become equipped with the practical tools & inspiration to jumpstart your creative journey.
objectives_summary: Get started on creative projects that have been stalled
Structure your creative life by learning to break down your time into hobbies, jobs, career, and vocation
Identify how your curiosity can trigger creativity

visible_instructors.job_title: Inspirational Screenwriting

items.headline: Learn the screenwriting secrets behind successful cinematic stories in the world of film & television script writing.
objectives_summary: By the end of this course, you will be able to sculpt a full length feature film screenplay.

items.title: Screenwriting & Storytelling Blueprint: Hero's Two Journeys

visible_instructors.name: IFH

visible_instructors.title: IFH Courses

visible_instructors.job_title: Screenplay Consultant & Story Expert
visible_instructors.title: Michael Hauge

items.headline: Filmmaking is all about storytelling. Screenwriting experts Michael Hauge & Chris Vogler teach this game changing class.
objectives_summary: Master the essential elements of story for film, television and fiction
Unite the outer journey of PLOT with the inner journey of TRANSFORMATION
Achieve the single ESSENTIAL goal of all storytelling

items.title: COMPLETE Creative Writing - All Genres - THE FULL COURSE!

visible_instructors.name: Trace
visible_instructors.job_title: Instructor / Writer / Teacher for over 20 years
visible_instructors.title: Trace Crawford

items.headline: Learn to write engaging Fiction, Poetry, Drama, & Creative Non-Fiction and become the successful writer you want to be
objectives_summary: This is a fun and practical creative writing course designed to get you excited about creating your own work!
Fiction, poetry, drama, and creative non-fiction - the four genres of creative writing.
How to discover, perfect, and share your own writer's voice.

items.title: Disciplined Dreaming: Lead Breakthrough Creativity at Work

visible_instructors.job_title: 5X Tech Entrepreneur, Keynote Speaker, Best-Selling Author
visible_instructors.title: Josh Linkner

items.headline: Use Josh Linkner's Disciplined Dreaming system to learn how to use creativity & innovation to drive results
objectives_summary: Build a system for expanding your creative capacity, fueling competitive advantage, and producing personal and professional growth.
Launch your leadership as a forward-thinking, entrepreneurial, creative mind!
Understand the power of creativity related to engagement, empowerment and employee retention.

Know the storytelling fundamentals that make stories flow and function
Understand how to create impactful and emotional stories

items.title: Intro to Storytelling: Wow Your Crowd

visible_instructors.job_title: Head Instructor at The Story Studio
visible_instructors.title: Kevin Allison

items.headline: A practical, step-by-step guide to brainstorming on, workshopping and presenting oral stories.
objectives_summary: Become a more engaging, clear and compelling communicator.
Increase your charisma, using your voice, body, emotions and intelligence.
Entertain and make a meaningful impact on your listeners.

items.title: Skyrocket Your Creativity and Get Better Ideas: 7 Easy Ways

visible_instructors.name: Kristen
visible_instructors.job_title: Professor, Award-Winning Artist, & Digital Do-Gooder
visible_instructors.title: Kristen Palana

items.headline: Learn how you can develop your creativity muscles with basic but effective techniques to get better ideas in just 1 hour
objectives_summary: Reboot the natural creative process by practicing simple exercises and techniques.
Increase the quality and quanitity of ideas generated daily and over time.
Have access to resources and actvities that help unlock creativity for overcoming creative blocks, uninspired thinking, cliches, and stale ideas.

Gain an understanding of the fundamentals of drawing, including, composition, perspective and shading
Be able to create art with stippling techniques

items.title: Writing Great Fantasy: World Building Workshop

visible_instructors.name: Jason
visible_instructors.job_title: Writer, Instructor, Speaker, Storyteller
visible_instructors.title: Jason Link

items.headline: Writing fantasy: The step-by-step method to writing a believable and compelling world that will enchant your readers
objectives_summary: Build a believable and compelling world for a fantasy story
Map out your world -- natural features (mountains, rivers, forests, etc.) and people made features (countries, cities, and roads)
Create fantastic creatures that survive in your world's habitats

items.headline: Screenwriting doesn't have to be hard
objectives_summary: The biggest mistake new screenwriters make
How to maximize your chances of screenwriting success in Hollywood BEFORE writing your script - This is HUGE!
What you should know about your story idea

visible_instructors.title: Eve Williams MMus

items.headline: The development of English Literature from its earliest texts to the present day
objectives_summary: You will learn about the development of genres, language and ideas in English Literature
You will learn about a variety of authors, their lives and how they influenced English Literature
You will learn about literary forms

objectives_summary: Use art as a means of self expression
Help others use the arts to heal and empower themselves
Help others by supporting them through the arts and the creative process

items.title: Humor Writing: How to Think, Write, Speak, and Be Funnier!

visible_instructors.name: Dave
visible_instructors.job_title: Travel Author / Writing and Personal Development Coach

items.headline: Great for Writing & Public Speaking: Learn the Techniques Professional Humorists Use to Create Consistently Funny Comedy
objectives_summary: Master the techniques professional humorists and comedy writers use to create consistently hilarious material
Learn how to find humor in nearly any situation
Discover how to take something that is funny, and stretch it to make it a lot funnier.
